page.shortlink: form layout custom control properties control html property
page.description: Specify the HTML for this control.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Control HTML]* property is used to define the HTML to render for the control. The HTML can be statically defined at design time or dynamically defined at run-time using JavaScript.
To dynamically define the HTML using JavaScript, you must specify a JavaScript function to call. To specify a JavaScript function, enter:

section.description: The JavaScript function must return an object with these properties: 'html' and 'items'.
